identificationModule.briefTitle: Phase I Clinical Trial of PCV24 in Adults
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of 24-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Adults 18 Years of Age and Older

descriptionModule.briefSummary: A Phase I clinical trial of 24-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (PCV24) developed by Sinovac Life Science Co., Ltd will be conducted in adults aged 18 years and older. The objective of the study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of Sinovac PCV24. The trial is a randomized, double-blind, controlled Phase I clinical trial.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
A phase I clinical trial of the study of 24-valent Pneumococcal Polysaccharide Conjugate Vaccine (PCV24) developed by Sinovac Life Science Co., Ltd (Sinovac) will be conducted in Chinese adults aged 18 years and older. The trial is a randomized, double-blind and active controlled study. The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of PCV24 manufactured by Sinovac Life Science Co., Ltd. The active control vaccine is the Pneumovax® manufactured by MSD. The placebo is 0.9%NaCl solution.

A total of at least 168 participants will be enrolled, including 84 adults aged 18-59 years and 84 elderly people aged ≥60 years. Participants will be randomized in a 2:2:2:1 ratio to receive one dose of PCV24 formulation 1, PCV24 formulation 2, Pneumovax® or placebo.

armGroups.label: Experimental group 1
armGroups.description: 48 participants will be randomized to receive Sinovac PCV24 formulation 1. Route of administration is intramuscular injection at deltoid muscle of upper arm. Immunization schedule is 1 dose.

armGroups.label: Experimental group 2
armGroups.description: 48 participants will be randomized to receive Sinovac PCV24 formulation 2. Route of administration is intramuscular injection at deltoid muscle of upper arm. Immunization schedule is 1 dose.

armGroups.label: Active control group
armGroups.description: 48 participants will be randomized to receive Pneumovax®. Route of administration is intramuscular injection at deltoid muscle of upper arm. Immunization schedule is 1 dose.

armGroups.label: Placebo group
armGroups.description: 24 participants will be randomized to receive placebo. Route of administration is intramuscular injection at deltoid muscle of upper arm. Immunization schedule is 1 dose.

interventions.name: Sinovac PCV24 formulation 1
interventions.description: One dose of Sinovac PCV24 formulation 1（0.5mL）

interventions.name: Sinovac PCV24 formulation 2
interventions.description: One dose of Sinovac PCV24 formulation 2（0.5mL）

interventions.name: Pneumovax®
interventions.description: One dose of Pneumovax® (0.5 mL) contains 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6B, 7F, 8, 9N, 9V, 10A, 11A, 12F, 14, 15B, 17F, 18C, 19A, 19F, 20, 22F, 23F and 33F saccharides.

primaryOutcomes.description: Incidence of adverse reactions within 30 days after vaccination

secondaryOutcomes.description: Incidence of adverse reactions within 7 days after vaccination
Incidence of SAE during the period of safety monitoring

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence of clinically significant abnormality in laboratory examination tests
secondaryOutcomes.description: Incidence of clinically significant abnormality in blood routine, blood biochemistry and urine routine test results within 3 days after vaccination

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Pneumococcal serotype-specific IgG antibody geometric mean concentration (GMC)
Pneumococcal serotype-specific IgG antibody geometric mean increase (GMI)
Proportion of pneumococcal serotype-specific IgG antibody concentration increase≥4
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of IgG antibody concentration increase≥four folds 30 days after vaccination

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Pneumococcal serotype-specific opsonophagocytic assay (OPA) geometric mean titer (GMTs)
Proportion of pneumococcal serotype-specific OPA antibody titer increase≥4
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of OPA antibody titer increase≥four folds 30 days after vaccination

overallOfficials.name: Kai Chu
overallOfficials.affiliation: Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention (Jiangsu Provincial Academy of Preventive Medicine)

locations.facility: Jiangsu Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention
